word:
Sister Penfield told her husband to go for God's people, she sent for us. It was rather of a trial for me to start, it was rainy and I had been very weak all day, but I concluded to go. James felt he must go too. Brother and Sister Ralph also went according to her request. We prayed for her at ten o'clock that night and the Spirit began to settle. She had been 


                                    -249- 

in very great agony, but we anointed her with oil in the name of the Lord, and then our earnest cries went up to God for healing power.
